attributes.action: pay of national debt by printing more money to pay it
attributes.additional_details:
print more money to pay the national debt off, bondholders take a loss through inflation, but the taxpayer has a smaller bill to pay.
without our debt we can reduce tax and get the average joe's take home pay up ( even in real terms ). then all we have to do as a nation is live within our means. we have printed more money before, this time lets make it get in the pockets of everyone who works for a living
